newsitem.title: JAPAN: INSIGHT - JGBs seen falling to 123 after Sakakibara.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - JGBs seen falling to 123 after Sakakibara.

text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
failure OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION : drainage of 100 bln yen
*Key June 10-year Japanese government bond (JGB) futures are expected to fall on Monday with 123.00 in sight.

*Sentiment worsened after Friday's Tokyo close after senior Finance Ministry official Eisuke Sakakibara was quoted as telling Le Monde that a rise in Japan's discount rate to 1.0 percent is expected in the coming year.
